text: Poistine, oni vozvodyat na Allakha lozh'. Tot, kto chestno vernot dolg zaimodavtsu v naznachennoye vremya, kak dogovorilis', boitsya Allakha. On ne umen'shit zanyatuyu summu i otdast dolg bez vsyakikh zaderzhek i provolochek. Allakh yego lyubit, potomu chto on bogoboyaznen, a Allakh lyubit bogoboyaznennykh
